name: CryptoBuddy
description: CryptoBuddy is a quant-grade AI trading agent that delivers institutional-level crypto signals and market intelligence, powered by Nexus microstructure models and on-chain X402 micropayments.
longDescription:
CryptoBuddy is a next-generation AI trading agent built on Nexus — the multi-agent quant intelligence framework designed for real-time crypto markets. Unlike rule-based bots or simple sentiment models, CryptoBuddy blends microstructure analytics, liquidation mapping, ATR volatility engines, futures OI flow, CVD, MELA, LCI concentration, and regime detection to produce precision BUY/SELL/HOLD signals with conviction scores.

Every output is paired with natural-language explanations generated through LLM reasoning, but grounded strictly in real market metrics (TOON snapshots). No hallucination, no external assumptions — each explanation comes from the precision model itself.

CryptoBuddy runs on X402 micropayments, allowing anyone to consume institutional-grade analytics per-endpoint with seamless pay-per-call access. Detailed signals, market commentary, and lightweight machine-friendly signals make it suitable for trading bots, quant pipelines, dashboards, and autonomous AI agents.

Designed to match the standard of professional prop-desk analysis, CryptoBuddy is fast, interpretable, and built for real trading workflows.

POST /signal-simple.description: Lightweight BUY/SELL/HOLD + conviction only. No LLM. Ideal for bots.

POST /signal.description: Full detailed signal with LLM reasoning. Good for trading agents & dashboards.

POST /analysis-simple.description: Short, human-readable market commentary. No signal reasoning.

POST /analysis.description: Premium full analysis: market commentary + signal wrap-up (LLM generated).
